title: 40 Hearses For 40 Coffins: Netherlands Mourns Malaysian Jet Victims
teaser: The remains of passengers of the downed Malaysia Airlines flight arrived in the Netherlands, on what has been a national day of mourning. Most of those killed in the jet that was brought down over Ukraine were Dutch. Robert Siegel talks with Thomas Erdbrink of The New York Times, who is in the Netherlands.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
